mainEntity.name: Brand new villa compatible with Mazaya program
mainEntity.description:
Brand new 4 bedrooms villa available for sale in Dumistan area                  ..

Compatible with Mazaya program         ..

Mazaya program is:
A housing service that is represented in the support provided by the ministry through the access of the program to the bank financing from the participating bank for the purpose of buying a house, and the beneficiary pays 25% of his income as a monthly installment, while the government is committed through the ministry to provide government financial support that covers the rest of the value of the premiums Monthly with the financing bank.

The use of “benefits” is available to everyone who has an existing housing request for any types of housing services, or whoever meets the requirements for using the program.


Consisting of       :

-                  4 bedrooms                ,

-                  5 bathrooms                ,

-                  2 Living rooms              ,

-                  Kitchen               ,

-                  Maid's room              ,

-                  Storage room             ,

-                  Large balcony               ,

-                  Laundry room             ,

-                  Garage for 2 cars            ,


Land area                  -               252 sqmtrs                               .

Built up area         -         297 sqmtrs                                     .


Asking price is         -          BHD 124,000                            .

mainEntity.name: Rented to Navy Luxury 2 Bedroom Furnished
mainEntity.description:
ICONIC DESIGN
A rare opportunity to live or invest in juffair's upcoming landmark building and newest addition to the Fontana series: Fontana Suites.
         
Created with a vision that is as forward thinking as it is grounded, Fontana Suites constitutes upcompromised design, quality and style. Setting a new standard for suites living, Fontana Suites is unlike anything ever launched in Bahrain before.

STYLISH FLOOR PLAN
Fontana Suites is a modern landmark in juffair, and its trendy curbside flair can also be sensed within the tower walls.

The tower comprises 373 units, each suites representing a culmination of the smartset architectural thinking. These self-contained apartments raise the standards of ingenious design for maximizing living spaces.

There are options for studio style living, or one, two and three bedroom suites. Each floor only hosts a handful of apartments, which translates into low density living, ideal for balancing a busy lifestyle with the comfort of coming home.

mainEntity.name: Villa available for Rent in Al Malikiyah area
A distinctive modern design villa in Saar!
mainEntity.description:
The villa is located in the Saar area, in an ideal location where all services are available, such as schools, restaurants, banks, shopping malls, cafes and malls.
The villas are characterized by high and finishing finishing and build quality.

The villa is located near Saint Christopher’s School, Al Nakheel Mall and Saar Mall
The villa contains: -

3 lounges with pool view
5 master bedrooms with excellent space
And 6 toilets
A house worker room
And the position of two cars
In addition to a swimming pool in the villa
The land area is 388 m
And the building area is 530 m

- The best offer in the region. Call now and book a preview! -
-
Saar is the most tranquil area in the Kingdom of Bahrain as it is considered one of the most prestigious areas in the Kingdom, it is a modern and beautiful area because of its location near the capital as well as the King Fahd Bridge and the highway, Saar is located within the Northern Governorate and is characterized by the proximity of restaurants, cafes, complexes and sports clubs As well as gardens and parks, Saar is one of the most sought-after areas for housing or rentals, as it is suitable for all categories and classes of individuals or families.

mainEntity.description:
Burj Kadi

 literally takes you to the walk amidst the clouds!

Located amidst the scenic waterfront of Juffair, Burj Kadi is a new symbol of luxury and modern life that is set to be the most popular address in Bahrain. It has been designed by renowned architects who add a lot to the features and advantages offered by Kadi Tower.

- Swimming pool with panoramic sea view

- Cinema
- Health club, sauna and steam bath.
- Indoor swimming pool, health club, sauna and steam bath for women.

With close proximity to renowned shopping malls, supermarkets, parks, hospitals, schools, the marina Corniche and the Khalifa Park within you’re your neighborhood, Burj Kadi  provides easy access to the Bahrain International Airport and Saudi Causeway makes living convenient

mainEntity.name: Sky and Luxury 3 Bedrooms+Maid Signature
mainEntity.description:
One Bahrain Bay is a bespoke architectural masterpiece designed to attract attention. The striking towers are the height of design elegance and style. 

The freehold residential towers, offer many firsts for Bahrain residential developments including a 50 metre infinity pool, an indoor garden offering a year round outdoor lifestyle and the exclusive residents only  "One Club" lounge.                        

Offering 740 luxurious 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments,  in a multitude of floorplans.

Apartments at One Bahrain Bay have been designed as a definitive statement of style. With floor to ceiling windows, every apartment has been designed to maximise the view as well as focus on providing generous amounts of living space through clever interior space planning.

While the different collections offer varied tones, both have carefully chosen textures and bespoke details, joinery focal points and discrete lighting to create a relaxed and welcoming space that you will be proud to call home

mainEntity.name: Freehold Luxurious 4BR Villa in Diyar  Muharraq
mainEntity.description:
→ Alsidra is a luxury gated residential community located at Diyar Al Muharraq, comprising 452 luxury villas of varying designs and capacities.

→ Located in the heart of Diyar Al Muharraq, Alsidra connects you directly to the most sought after attractions on the island such as:

  • Marassi Beach
  • Amwaj Islands 
  • Dragon City
  • 15-minute drive from Bahrain International Airport
  • Few minutes away from hospitals and schools

→ The project offers an attractive environment for families by offering different types of villas, ranging from 2-bedroom villas to 5-bedrooms.

→ Each villa is designed either in a modern or a modernized version of traditional designs between Bahraini architecture and modern Moroccan.

→ Alsidra offers its residents the opportunity to live in the house of their dream and enjoy a natural feeling of belonging


→ Alsidra exudes the gated community lifestyle at affordable price ranges. From lavish community landscaping to proper neighborhood street planning, this community is the ideal location to have a property that is safe and secure.


Alsidra offers:
• Open Floor Plan Spacious Living and Dining Room
• Open Floor Plan Kitchen and Outside Dirty Kitchen

mainEntity.name: Villa Fayrooz 800 in Durrat Al Bahrain
mainEntity.description:
Villa Fayrooz 800 includes all the modern requirements necessary for modern life in Durrat Al Bahrain.

Villa Overview:-

The ground floor consists of an open reception hall and a modern design kitchen. This spacious five-bedroom villa has two private garages and additional space for more than two cars within the villa's grounds. On the ground floor there is a hall that allows fresh air, and leads to an open hall in front of the kitchen. The spacious ground floor also includes a guest bedroom with bathroom, residential facilities for driver and butler, a preparation kitchen, a guest bathroom, warehouses and a swimming pool. The barbecue overlooking the garden and pool area forms a façade with a swimming pool, dressing room and separate bathroom.

The first floor of the 168 Fayrooz Island Villas 4 and 5 contains a master bedroom and a balcony overlooking the sea. Also, all four bedrooms on the upper floor have changing rooms. The splendor of construction quality is demonstrated by the finishing work on all floors, walls, bathroom fixtures, central air conditioning system and fully equipped interior kitchen. Knowing that there are 3 types of turquoise 800 villas that differ only in interior finishes and bathroom fixtures.

- Offer is valid for limited period
- The villa is new and never lived before.
- The original price is 395 thousand.
- The current price is only 310 thousand

Hurry up before selling the villa!

        ie. 20% down payment &  installments of 10% each payable every 6 months.

Beautiful Three Floors Villa Available for sale , It comes with Seven En-suite bedrooms , It also has Three Living rooms that are huge in size , This Lovely Property has two Kitchens , Indoor and outdoor Kitchens ,in addition to a cold Kitchen on the first Floor ,It has a maid quarter and Three Store rooms that can be changed into a study room or anything else !

Amwaj Island is one of the ideal places to live in if you prefer the fusion if an island and cosmopolitan living. The area is the perfect balance of the residential and commercial area. It is just a few minutes off the Lagoon, a common place which offers various restaurants, recreational activities, coffee shops and many more.
Location wise, Amwaj is at least a 25-minute drive to Manama Downtown, 15 minutes to the airport, 5 minutes to Diyar Muharraq. It has easy access to the high way which makes getting to anywhere in Bahrain easy.
Appointment is By Viewing.
